generated.css: body{margin:0;color:#1f1f1f;font-family:Montserrat}main{margin-top:5%;margin-left:10%;margin-right:10%}@media (max-width:50em){main{margin-left:5%;margin-right:5%}}header{background-color:#009eae;opacity:.8;color:#fff;justify-content:space-between;padding:0 30px}.header-list,header{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}@media (max-width:50em){header{justify-content:center}.header-list{margin-top:2rem;flex-direction:column;text-align:center;width:100%}}.nav-item{display:flex;align-items:center;padding:1.5rem;text-decoration:none;color:#fff;font-size:1.3rem;justify-content:center}.nav-item:hover{font-weight:700;border-bottom:4px solid #fff}.logo{display:flex;align-items:center;padding:5px 20px;flex-wrap:wrap}.logo-text{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin-left:1rem;color:#fff;font-size:2rem;font-weight:700}.logo-img{width:100px;height:100px;background-color:#fff;border-radius:50%;border:5px solid #000}footer{background-color:#757575;color:#fff;text-align:center;margin-top:5%;padding:20px}.border-top{background-color:#009eae;opacity:.8;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center;padding:5rem;justify-content:center}.logo-index{width:300px;height:300px;background-color:#fff;border-radius:50%;border:8px solid #000}@media (max-width:30em){.logo-index{width:100%;height:100%}}.link-container{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;align-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap;padding-left:0}.link-item{display:inline-block;margin:5px;padding:10px}.link-item:hover{font-weight:700;border-bottom:3px solid #33b1be;box-shadow:0 4px 6px -5px #33b1be}.link{color:#33b1be;font-size:1.4rem}.lema{font-weight:400;font-size:1.2rem;font-style:italic}.presentacion article{text-align:justify}article figure{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;flex-flow:column;margin:3% 0}figure img{width:100%}figcaption{font-size:.9rem;margin-top:5px;font-style:italic}@media (min-width:60em){figure img{max-width:50%}}.video{text-align:center;margin:3% 0}.video iframe{max-width:90%;border:0}.food-container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;justify-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:1rem}@media (max-width:70em){.food-container{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}}@media (max-width:50em){.food-container{grid-template-columns:1fr}}.food{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex:1 1;margin-top:3rem;max-width:25rem;background-color:rgba(51,177,190,.47058823529411764);box-shadow:0 20px 40px -14px rgba(0,0,0,.25)}.food a{height:100%}.food a:hover{opacity:.9;box-shadow:0 50px 50px -14px rgba(0,0,0,.25)}.food-img{width:100%;height:15rem}.food-content{padding:1rem}.food-recipe,.instructions{list-style:none}.ingredient,.instruction{display:flex;line-height:1.5rem}.instruction-number,.quantity{color:#70bcaf;font-weight:700;text-align:right;width:55px;letter-spacing:1.5px}.description{margin-left:10px;width:100%}.details-image{margin:3% auto;width:50%;display:block}.review{margin-top:5%;padding:2rem;background-color:#e0e0e0;text-align:left}.review button{margin-top:10px;padding:.7rem;font-family:Montserrat}.star-review{direction:rtl}.review a{color:#000;transition:color .4s}.review a:focus,.review a:focus~a,.review a:hover,.review a:hover~a{color:orange;cursor:pointer}#thanks-text{font-weight:700;display:none}.relationed-foods{display:flex;justify-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap}.relationed-food{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin:1%;background-color:rgba(51,177,190,.47058823529411764);box-shadow:0 20px 40px -14px rgba(0,0,0,.25)}.relationed-food:hover{opacity:.8;box-shadow:0 50px 50px -14px rgba(0,0,0,.25)}.rel-food-img{width:400px;height:100%}@media (max-width:50em){.details-image,.rel-food-img{width:100%}}.no-decoration{text-decoration:none}.black{color:#000}.titulo{color:#a01127;border-bottom:1px solid}.active{font-weight:700;border-bottom:3px solid #fff}h1{color:#4bacb8;border-bottom:2px solid;width:55%;font-size:2rem}h2{font-size:1.7rem}h3{font-size:1.4rem}.breadcrumb{list-style:none;display:flex;color:#4bacb8}.breadcrumb a{color:inherit}ul.breadcrumb li+li:before{padding:8px;content:"/\00a0"}.breadcrumb a:hover{text-decoration:underline;font-weight:700}.bigger{font-size:4rem}@media (max-width:50em){.bigger{font-size:2rem}}
